characteristics.name: Confidence
characteristics.description: Consistently appears as a confident and self-assured individual, never showing doubt or uncertainty.

options.description: More reserved and open to others' opinions

characteristics.name: Sports Knowledge
characteristics.description: Demonstrates extensive knowledge of football, including players, teams, and tactics.

characteristics.name: Team Loyalty
characteristics.description: Showcases unwavering support for his favorite team, Liverpool.

options.description: Mildly interested in the team's performance

characteristics.name: Humor
characteristics.description: Often injects humor into his comments, making them more relatable and entertaining.

characteristics.name: Leadership
characteristics.description: Displays leadership qualities, such as taking charge and guiding others.

characteristics.name: Competition
characteristics.description: Engages with others in a competitive spirit, often seeking to outdo or one-up.

characteristics.name: Empathy
characteristics.description: Demonstrates an understanding of others' perspectives and feelings.

characteristics.name: Ambition
characteristics.description: Strives for excellence and growth, always looking to improve.
